short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blur or gray images and videos in your browser to gain control over how you are exposed to content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Blurrify extension lets you set the intensity of an image blur, make all images grayscale, and gives you an option to unblur content on hover.

Who is this for?

- Anyone browsing in public who wants to avoid over-the-shoulder peeks at their images and videos in chat apps or social media

- Professionals in the Trust & Safety or threat intel space who may need to engage with websites containing difficult content and want to protect their mental health

- Anyone who wants more control over how they are exposed to content when browsing and is looking for a solution to avoid exposure to unwanted images in ads or web pages
